pkgmetadata.longdescription: Infrastructure to Assemble Multi-Panel Figures (from Grobs) // Tools to create a layout for figures made of multiple panels, and to fill the panels with base, 'lattice', 'ggplot2' and 'ComplexHeatmap' plots, grobs, as well as content from all image formats supported by 'ImageMagick' (accessed through 'magick').
